title: NEED HELP! Game keeps reverting to old patch?
body: I recently got back into playing league. Every now and then,**** my game will revert to an old patch**** and i am**** forced to download a 1.6 gb update**** before I can play again. This takes me around 3 hours every time since the internet at my new place is pretty horrible. It has happened 3 times over the past week and is extremely frustrating when I have limitations as to when I am able to play. ****Any one else having this problem? Rito pls help**** {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
EW.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} 

I can imagine having to download that over and over being really obnoxious, but it's also a tell tale sign that something might be interfering with your installs in the first place, namely any firewalls or AV programs. Sometimes they will filter or even block necessary files the game needs. Let's make sure that they're not by [**checking this guide over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3); it can direct you to some steps for whitelisting LoL or _temporarily _ disabling them.

After you do that, try a clean reinstall using our handy-dandy [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to assist you. Let me know if you're still having to install that 1.6 GB update after this. :)
